items.description: An array of objects to display.

itemSize.description: The height/width of item according to orientation.
itemSize.description_zh: 根据方向的项的高度/宽度。

numToleratedItems.default: half the number of items shown in the view.
numToleratedItems.description:
Determines how many additional elements to add to the DOM outside of the view.
According to the scrolls made up and down, extra items are added in a certain algorithm in the form of multiples of this number.
numToleratedItems.description_zh:
确定在视图之外向 DOM 添加多少个其他元素。
根据上下组成的卷轴，以该数字的倍数的形式以一定的算法添加额外的项目。

delay.description: Delay in scroll before new data is loaded.
delay.description_zh: 加载新数据之前的滚动延迟。

resizeDelay.description_zh: 窗口大小调整完成后的延迟。

lazy.description: Defines if data is loaded and interacted with in lazy manner.
lazy.description_zh: 定义是否以延迟方式加载数据并与之交互。

disabled.description: If disabled, the VirtualScroller feature is eliminated and the content is displayed directly.
disabled.description_zh: 如果禁用，则 VirtualScroller 功能将被消除，内容将直接显示。

loaderDisabled.description: Used to implement a custom loader instead of using the loader feature in the VirtualScroller.
loaderDisabled.description_zh: 用于实现自定义加载器，而不是使用 VirtualScroller 中的 loader 功能。

showSpacer.description: Used to implement a custom spacer instead of using the spacer feature in the VirtualScroller.
showSpacer.description_zh: 用于实现自定义 spacer，而不是使用 VirtualScroller 中的 spacer 功能。

tabindex.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.
tabindex.description_zh: 按 Tab 键顺序排列的元素索引。

inline.description: When enabled, positions the content as inline.
inline.description_zh: 启用后，将内容定位为内联。

step.description: Used to specify how many items to load in each load method in lazy mode.
step.description_zh: 用于指定在延迟模式下每个 load 方法中要加载的项目数。

appendOnly.description: Used to append each loaded item to top without removing any items from the DOM. Using very large data may cause the browser to crash.
appendOnly.description_zh: 用于将每个加载的项目附加到顶部，而不从 DOM 中删除任何项目。使用非常大的数据可能会导致浏览器崩溃。

autoSize.description: Whether to dynamically change the height or width of scrollable container.
autoSize.description_zh: 是否动态更改可滚动容器的高度或宽度。

dt.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.
dt.description_zh: 它使用组件的设计令牌生成范围限定的 CSS 变量。

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.
pt.description_zh: 用于将属性传递给组件内的 DOM 元素。

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.
ptOptions.description_zh: 用于配置组件的 passthrough（pt） 选项。

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
unstyled.description_zh: 启用后，它会删除核心中与组件相关的样式。

slots.name: content
slots.params: { items: any, // An array of objects to display for virtualscroller styleClass: string, // Style class of the content contentRef: (el: any) ⇒ void, // Referance of the content getItemOptions: (index: number) ⇒ VirtualScrollerItemOptions, // Options of the items loading: boolean, // Whether the data is loaded. getLoaderOptions: (index: number, ext: any) ⇒ VirtualScrollerLoaderOptions, // Loader options of the items while the data is loading. itemSize: undefined, // The height/width of item according to orientation. rows: undefined, // The number of the rendered rows. columns: undefined, // The number of the rendered columns. spacerStyle: any, // The style of spacer element. contentStyle: any, // The style of content element. vertical: boolean, // Whether the orientation is vertical. horizontal: boolean, // Whether the orientation is horizontal. both: boolean, // Whether the orientation is both. }

slots.name: item
loadingicon
